diagnosis.differential_diagnosis: Type 1 diabetes mellitus, Type 2 diabetes mellitus
diagnosis.diagnostic_reasoning: The patient presented with weight loss, polydipsia, and polyuria with a fasting blood glucose of 12 mmol/L. Negative GAD antibodies and a C-peptide level indicating endogenous insulin production supported a diagnosis of monogenic diabetes (MODY). A mutation in HNF4A was identified confirming the diagnosis.
